name: Hedgehog Escape from the Lost Village
name_original: Hedgehog Escape from the Lost Village
description:
Hedgehog Escape from the Lost Village is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks! You will get hooked on this game!

Help the blue hedgehog to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins and get ranked in the leaderboard.

Hedgehog Escape from the Lost Village is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!

If you love animals and hedgehogs you will love this game!
